channel.title: Client & server question | Decompiling question | Compiling error
channel.description:
[b]PROBLEM 1:[/b] I am using [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,458254.msg3353250.html#msg3353250]DARK H3LL'S CLIENT[/url] and some other source and idk whats the problem, the client doesnt loads up. I changed ip in 'client.java'. But how it connects to my source. I cant connect them, whenever i try client it doesnt load up the cache.
[b]PROBLEM 2:[/b] If this isn't possible for you to solve or might be: help me getting a good decompiler, JAD decompiler doesnt work, i mean how to put them
[b]PROBLEM 3:[/b] Give me some possible solutions to error 'illegal start of expression'.
I really need a decompiler tried many, but haven't got what i want. I hope someone would help me. Please download the following .class file and decompile it for me.
[url=http://uppit.com/o2223q88ltkt/client.class][CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD THAT CLASS FILE][/url] [url=http://uppit.com/y6fxsjgs6kjn/client.java][CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD THE JAVA FILE][/url]
Anyways, if you could tell me how to fix the following '100 errors'
[code] ^ client.java:3186: illegal start of expression if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:3186: not a statement if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:3186: 'else' without 'if' if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:3186: illegal start of expression if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:3186: ';' expected if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:3204: illegal start of expression if(true) goto _L4; else goto _L3 ^ client.java:3204: not a statement if(true) goto _L4; else goto _L3 ^ client.java:3204: 'else' without 'if' if(true) goto _L4; else goto _L3 ^ client.java:3204: illegal start of expression if(true) goto _L4; else goto _L3 ^ client.java:3204: ';' expected if(true) goto _L4; else goto _L3 ^ client.java:3945: not a statement unknownhostexception1; ^ client.java:6937: '.class' expected int j; ^ client.java:6937: not a statement int j; ^ client.java:6956: not a statement this; ^ client.java:6957: ';' expected JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:6957: not a statement JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:6958: not a statement aString881; ^ client.java:6960: not a statement (char)j; ^ client.java:6963: not a statement aString881; ^ client.java:6974: not a statement this; ^ client.java:6975: ';' expected JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:6975: not a statement JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:6976: not a statement aString1212; ^ client.java:6978: not a statement (char)j; ^ client.java:6981: not a statement aString1212; ^ client.java:7044: not a statement this; ^ client.java:7045: ';' expected JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7045: not a statement JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7046: not a statement aString1004; ^ client.java:7048: not a statement (char)j; ^ client.java:7051: not a statement aString1004; ^ client.java:7084: not a statement this; ^ client.java:7085: ';' expected JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7085: not a statement JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7086: not a statement aString1004; ^ client.java:7088: not a statement (char)j; ^ client.java:7091: not a statement aString1004; ^ client.java:7118: not a statement this; ^ client.java:7119: ';' expected JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7119: not a statement JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7120: not a statement aString887; ^ client.java:7122: not a statement (char)j; ^ client.java:7125: not a statement aString887; ^ client.java:7278: illegal start of expression if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:7278: not a statement if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:7278: 'else' without 'if' if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:7278: illegal start of expression if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:7278: ';' expected if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:7280: illegal start of expression } ^ client.java:7282: illegal start of expression public byte[] GetModel(int i) ^ client.java:7282: ';' expected public byte[] GetModel(int i) ^ client.java:7282: illegal start of expression public byte[] GetModel(int i) ^ client.java:7282: ';' expected public byte[] GetModel(int i) ^ client.java:7282: '.class' expected public byte[] GetModel(int i) ^ client.java:7282: ';' expected public byte[] GetModel(int i) ^ client.java:7293: not a statement exception; ^ client.java:7297: illegal start of expression public byte[] loadmod(int i) ^ client.java:7297: ';' expected public byte[] loadmod(int i) ^ client.java:7297: ';' expected public byte[] loadmod(int i) ^ client.java:7308: not a statement exception; ^ client.java:7312: illegal start of expression public final void method74(int i, int j, int k) ^ client.java:7312: illegal start of type public final void method74(int i, int j, int k) ^ client.java:7312: ';' expected public final void method74(int i, int j, int k) ^ client.java:7312: ')' expected public final void method74(int i, int j, int k) ^ client.java:7312: not a statement public final void method74(int i, int j, int k) ^ client.java:7312: ';' expected public final void method74(int i, int j, int k) ^ client.java:7312: <identifier> expected public final void method74(int i, int j, int k) ^ client.java:7312: not a statement public final void method74(int i, int j, int k) ^ client.java:7312: ';' expected public final void method74(int i, int j, int k) ^ client.java:7450: illegal start of expression public final void method75(int i, Class9 class9) ^ client.java:7450: illegal start of type public final void method75(int i, Class9 class9) ^ client.java:7450: ';' expected public final void method75(int i, Class9 class9) ^ client.java:7450: ')' expected public final void method75(int i, Class9 class9) ^ client.java:7450: not a statement public final void method75(int i, Class9 class9) ^ client.java:7450: ';' expected public final void method75(int i, Class9 class9) ^ client.java:7450: ';' expected public final void method75(int i, Class9 class9) ^ client.java:7685: not a statement class9_1; ^ client.java:7716: not a statement class9; ^ client.java:7717: ';' expected JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7717: not a statement JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7718: not a statement aString248; ^ client.java:7720: not a statement "|"; ^ client.java:7723: not a statement aString248; ^ client.java:7726: not a statement class9; ^ client.java:7727: ';' expected JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7727: not a statement JVM INSTR dup_x1 ; ^ client.java:7728: not a statement aString248; ^ client.java:7730: not a statement " "; ^ client.java:7733: not a statement aString248; ^ client.java:7869: illegal start of expression public final void method76(byte byte0) ^ client.java:7869: illegal start of type public final void method76(byte byte0) ^ client.java:7869: ';' expected public final void method76(byte byte0) ^ client.java:7869: ')' expected public final void method76(byte byte0) ^ client.java:7869: not a statement public final void method76(byte byte0) ^ client.java:7869: ';' expected public final void method76(byte byte0) ^ client.java:7983: illegal start of expression public final void method77(String s, int i, String s1, boolean flag) ^ client.java:7983: illegal start of type public final void method77(String s, int i, String s1, boolean flag) ^ client.java:7983: ';' expected public final void method77(String s, int i, String s1, boolean flag) ^ client.java:7983: ')' expected public final void method77(String s, int i, String s1, boolean flag) ^ 100 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Thats all, help me plz...

pasta stop posting on topics you have no clue about i first thought you were just trying to be helpful but no your just getting post count up if i had the rep points i would of --repped you by now your about as useful as a chocolate teapot…

decompiler for .class files not a compiler to make class files into java files

item.source: Client & server question | Decompiling question | Compiling error

item.title: Client & server question | Decompiling question | Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

i got 317 client compile which works

There you go

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Might have 2 change abit

Gl Mate

Read full topic

item.title: Client & server question | Decompiling question | Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

I’ve already told you the goddamn problem.

Problem 2: JAD does work.
Problem 3:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:8, topic:362979”]The decompiler couldn’t correctly analyse and replace all the method calls and variables properly. You are left with likes like

GOTO _L2:
JVMINSTRUSTION

And other shit, you need to replace (or delete) these… You might need to add the proper method calls back in to make the client work properly.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Client & server question | Decompiling question | Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

The decompiler couldn’t correctly analyse and replace all the method calls and variables properly. You are left with likes like

GOTO _L2:
JVMINSTRUSTION

And other shit, you need to replace (or delete) these… You might need to add the proper method calls back in to make the client work properly.

item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

PROBLEM 1:
I am using DARK H3LL’S CLIENT and some other source and idk whats the problem, the client doesnt loads up. I changed ip in ‘client.java’. But how it connects to my source. I cant connect them, whenever i try client it doesnt load up the cache.

PROBLEM 2:
If this isn’t possible for you to solve or might be: help me getting a good decompiler, JAD decompiler doesnt work, i mean how to put them

PROBLEM 3:
Give me some possible solutions to error ‘illegal start of expression’.

I really need a decompiler tried many, but haven’t got what i want. I hope someone would help me. Please download the following .class file and decompile it for me.

[CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD THAT CLASS FILE]
[CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD THE JAVA FILE]

Anyways, if you could tell me how to fix the following ‘100 errors’

^ client.java:3186: illegal start of expression if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:3186: not a statement if(true) goto _L2; else goto _L1 ^ client.java:3186: 'else' without 'if' if(true) goto _L2;
